ai-snp4.5:1.1_0: having seen that wisdom in this life,
ai-snp4.5:1.2_0: When people in the world are northern,
ai-snp4.5:1.4_0: Therefore he is quarrelsome and frightening,
ai-snp4.5:2.1_0: when a person sees a benefit
ai-snp4.5:2.2_0: in what is seen, heard, or thought.
ai-snp4.5:2.3_0: and with that agitated corpse is up to heaven.
ai-snp4.5:2.4_0: One sees all that is lowly,
ai-snp4.5:3.1_0: the skillful makes you a good,
ai-snp4.5:3.2_0: For one who sees that is lowly depressed,
ai-snp4.5:3.3_0: Therefore, when you’ve seen the heard
ai-snp4.5:4.1_0: also wouldn’t be allowed in the world.
ai-snp4.5:4.4_0: it seems to me that you’re poisoned.
ai-snp4.5:5.2_0: They create knowledge but don’t deny it.
ai-snp4.5:5.3_0: They’re like a monkey in the heart.
ai-snp4.5:5.4_0: there is no wrong view for you.
ai-snp4.5:6.1_0: For he whom there is no desire for fame,
ai-snp4.5:6.3_0: who there are no homes at them.
ai-snp4.5:7.1_0: here, having seen what is seen, heard, or sensed,
ai-snp4.5:7.3_0: that view is the defeat of views,
ai-snp4.5:8.1_0: if it is not suitable to a lotus pond;
ai-snp4.5:8.3_0: One is not a brahmin studying for virtue,
ai-snp4.5:8.4_0: they’ve crossed over to the far shore.
